channel.title: Supertest on QA Discovery
channel.description: Recent content in Supertest on QA Discovery

item.title: Supertest Tutorial: Getting Started and Setting Up Your Environment
item.description: Introduction Introduction of SuperTest Introduction of Jest Introduction of Mocha Introduction of CHAI Project dependencies Project Structure Next Introduction This project is a quick start tutorial for API automation testing using SuperTest, and will use Jest or Mocha as the testing framework for demo demonstration. We will introduce SuperTest, Jest and Mocha in turn, so that you can understand the basic usage of these tools in advance. Introduction of SuperTest “Supertest” is a popular JavaScript library for testing Node.

item.title: Supertest 教程：入门介绍和环境搭建准备
item.description: 介绍 SuperTest 介绍 Jest 介绍 Mocha 介绍 CHAI 简介 项目依赖 项目文件结构 Next 介绍 本项目是一个使用 SuperTest 进行 API 自动化测试的快速启动项目教程，会使用 Jest 或 Mocha 作为测试框架进行 demo 演
